name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force MS Yahei Font Allowing Exceptions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use MS Yahei font for all sites with exceptions that can be user-defined.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome plugin will enable you to force using Microsoft Yahei font for all webistes allowing exceptions. These exceptions can be user defined in "Options".
